chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) -> eqP A eqA n (minuspf p q) (minuspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))

mults_order_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) m1 m2) (mults multA (n:=n) m1 l))
splus : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM
pO_pluspf_inv1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p : list (Term A n), p = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pO A n) p
pO_pluspf_inv2 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p : list (Term A n), p = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (pO A n)
canonical_mults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (m : Term A n) (l : list (Term A n)), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) m -> canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (mults multA (n:=n) m l)
canonical_pluspf : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall l1 l2 : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM l1 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM l2 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 l2)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
